  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83393</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83393</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Détermination des doses de rayonnement d'un film-badge</string>
            <string language="en">Determining radiation doses from film badge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestimmung der Strahlung Dosen vom Filmabzeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando doses da radiação do emblema da 
película</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione delle dosi di radiazione dal 
distintivo della pellicola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικές δόσεις ακτινοβολίας από το διακριτικό 
ταινιών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de dosis de la radiación de la 
divisa de la película</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre qu'à partir d'un film-badge, un peut contrôler combien de rayonnement a été absorbé en  déterminant l'obscurité du film développé.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that from a film badge, one can check how much radiation has been absorbed by determining the darkness of the developed film.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le rayonnement d'alpha</string>
            <string language="en">alpha radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">aluminium</string>
            <string language="en">aluminium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayonnements bêta</string>
            <string language="en">beta radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">obscurité</string>
            <string language="en">darkness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">film développé</string>
            <string language="en">developed film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">insigne de film</string>
            <string language="en">film badge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">doses de  rayonnement</string>
            <string language="en">radiation doses</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die von einem 
Filmabzeichen, man kann überprüfen, wieviel Strahlung aufgesogen 
worden ist, indem man die Schwärzung des entwickelten Filmes 
feststellte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra aquela de um emblema da 
película, um pode verificar quanto radiação foi absorvida 
determinando a escuridão da película desenvolvida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quella da un 
distintivo della pellicola, una può controllare quanta radiazione è 
stata assorbita determinando la nerezza della pellicola sviluppata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι από ένα διακριτικό 
ταινιών, κάποιο μπορεί να ελέγξει πόση ακτινοβολία έχει 
απορροφηθεί με τον καθορισμό του σκοταδιού της αναπτυγμένης 
ταινίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra eso de una divisa de la
película, uno puede controlar cuánto radiación ha sido absorbida 
determinando la oscuridad de la película desarrollada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alphastrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aluminium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betastrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwärzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">entwickelter Film</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Filmabzeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung Dosen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação de alfa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">alumínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação beta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escuridão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">película desenvolvida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">doses da radiação</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-it">pellicola sviluppata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">distintivo della pellicola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dosi di radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δόσεις ακτινοβολίας</string>
